name: gmail-assistant
title: Gmail Assistant
description: This extension adds Gmail integration to Raycast, allowing users to send emails and check their inbox without leaving the Raycast interface.
author: Parikshith

commands.name: index
commands.title: Send Email
commands.subtitle: Compose and send an email to anyone
commands.description: Compose and send an email to anyone using your Gmail account. You can specify the recipient, subject, and body of the email.

commands.name: checkInbox
commands.title: Check Inbox
commands.subtitle: View your latest emails
commands.description: View your latest emails in your Gmail inbox. This command shows the sender, subject, and date of each email.
